titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on phosphoric acid, lanthanum salt, cerium terbium-doped.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/10/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on phosphoric acid, lanthanum salt, cerium terbium-doped.
